name: Basic Metalsense
desc: All with metalcraft have an innate, intuitive grasp of where nearby metal is.

abilities.name: Metalsense

name: Basic Woodsense
desc: All with woodcraft have an innate, intuitive grasp of where nearby wood is.

abilities.name: Woodsense

name: Basic Windsense
desc: All with windcraft have a specific sense of how the air near them is moving.

abilities.name: Windsense

name: Basic Stormcraft
desc: A more specialized focus on windcraft that, nonetheless, all practitioners of it have some basic skill with.

abilities.name: Stormcraft
Stormbending
abilities.effect: You have _Bend_ [_Lightning_] within Range 0. Additionally, you may use _Brawl_ against all Targets made of _Lightning_. If you choose the <u>Steal</u> option, you may instead Target any creature, but must Target a _Lightning_ piece of _Equipment_.

abilities.name: Jolt
abilities.effect: Attack a Target within Range. If the Target is _Wearing_ _Metal_, add [_Pierce_ 2].

name: Basic Barkcraft
desc: The absolute basics of barkcraft, a speciality of woodcraft that focuses on moving, controlling, and enhancing wood.

abilities.name: Barkcraft
Woodbending
abilities.effect: You have _Bend_ [_Wood_] within Range 0. Additionally, you may use _Brawl_ against all Targets made of _Wood_ or wearing _Wood_ Armor within that Range. If you choose the <u>Steal</u> option, you may instead Target any creature, but must Target a _Wood_ piece of _Equipment_.

abilities.name: Wooden Splinter
abilities.missile: An Unattended _Least Source_ (_Wood_) item or one _Worn by you/an ally within Range 0.
abilities.effect: Choose a Missile, then Attack a target within Range with it. If you choose a _Trinket_, add _Glancing_ to this Attack. After resolving the Attack, place the Missile unattended in the Target's _Arena_.
abilities.special: If the _Missile_ has an Attack with _Slash_ or _Crush_ you may replace _Stab_ with said keyword.

enhancements.name: Power Shot
enhancements.effect: You may instead use a _Minor Source_ (_Wood_) item as the _Missile_. Deal +_1/1/2/2_ Damage if you do.

name: Basic Lodecraft
desc: The absolute basics of lodecraft, a speciality of metalcraft that focuses on moving and controlling metal.

abilities.name: Lodecraft
Metalbending
abilities.effect: You have _Bend_ [_Metal_] within Range 0. Additionally, you may use _Brawl_ against all Targets made of _Metal_ or wearing _Metal_ Armor within that Range. If you choose the <u>Steal</u> option, you may instead Target any creature, but must Target a _Metal_ piece of _Equipment_.

abilities.name: Metal Shot
abilities.missile: An Unattended _Least Source_ (_Metal_) item or one _Worn by you/an ally within Range 0.
abilities.effect: Choose a Missile, then Attack a target within Range with it. If you choose a _Trinket_, add _Glancing_ to this Attack. After resolving the Attack, place the Missile unattended in the Target's _Arena_.
abilities.special: If the _Missile_ has an Attack with _Slash_ or _Stab_ you may replace _Crush_ with said keyword.

enhancements.name: Power Shot
enhancements.effect: You may instead use a _Minor Source_ (_Metal_) item as the _Missile_. Deal +_1/1/2/2_ Damage if you do.

name: Novice Anvilcraft
desc: The fundamentals of anvilcraft, a speciality of metalcraft that focuses on changing the structure of metal to strengthen, weaken, or alter the shape of it.

abilities.name: Anvilcraft
Fullmetal
abilities.effect:
Your equipment is sharper, harder, and otherwise more deadly than others. Gain the following:
* Whenever your [_Metal_] _Equipment_ would lose _Durability_ (even in narrative play) roll a d6; on a 6, it instead doesn't. Your _Spirit_ may take 1 _Fatigue_ to treat a failed roll as a success.
* Your Attacks using [_Metal_] Equipment gain [_Pierce_ 1].
* You gain +1 _Block_ if you _Block_ while _Wielding_ [_Metal_] Equipment or _Wearing_ [_Metal_] _Armor_.

imbues.name: Honed Edge
imbues.effect: In addition, deal +1 Damage with Attacks using [_Metal_] Equipment.

imbues.name: Hardened Hide
imbues.effect: In addition, gain +1 _Block_ if you're wearing [_Metal_] Armor, +1 if you're wearing at least 4 _Slots_ of it.

abilities.name: Perfect Edge
abilities.effect: Add [_Pierce_] 2 and _Sunder_ [_Reflex_]. If the Target Blocks, you must Target Wielded Equipment if possible. If you successfully _Sunder_, inflict 1 _Stun_ on all other creatures you are _Engaged_ with.

abilities.name: Shatter Spears
abilities.effect:
You have _Advantage_ to _Negate_ against _Sunder_ targeting _Metal_ Equipment this _Turn_ and gain +2 _Block_. If you lose no _Stamina_ from and are not _Sundered_ by the triggering Attack, choose one:
* _Sunder_ the weapon used for the Attack.
* Inflict _Exposed_/_Impaired_ [5 _Reflex_] on the Attacker if they are in _Melee_ Range
* Gain 1 _Block_.

name: Novice Galecraft
desc: The fundamentals of galecraft, the primary use of windcraft that simply creates and controls powerful bursts of wind.

abilities.name: Galecraft
Gust
abilities.effect: Attack a target within Range.

enhancements.name: Wind Tunnel
enhancements.effect:
Choose one:
* Attack one Target at Melee Range, and one at Range 0.
* Attack one Target at Range 0, and one at Range 1.

name: Novice Bloomcraft
desc: The fundamentals of bloomcraft, a speciality of woodcraft that focuses on manipulating living plant matter, causing it to bloom, grow, and change.

abilities.name: Bloomcraft
Ripen
abilities.effect: Whenever you find interesting plantlife (such as from _Forage_ you may induce growth in nearby plants, forcing some that are near bloom to ripen. Your Spirit gains 1 _Fatigue_, but you gain +1 of whatever you found. If you found no plantlife your GM may still allow you to use this ability to gain a single fruit that counts as _Food_ (Basic).

abilities.name: Control Growth
abilities.target: An _Overgrown_ Arena or one that is a _Source_ (_Plant_).
abilities.effect: The _Arena_ gains or removes _Overgrown_.

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.effect: The Target must _Negate_ [_Grit_/_Reflex_ 8] or gain _Entangled_ 1. If the Target is in an _Overgrown_ _Arena_, increase the _Negate_ DC by 2 or decrease the Cost by 1. _Fire_ Damage also causes the Target to clear _Entangled_ as if it was _Slash_ Damage.

enhancements.name: Massive Growth
enhancements.effect: 'Instead, the Target is 'All creatures in an _Overgrown_ _Arena_'.

name: Artist
desc: You are a skilled artist, allowing you to accurately capture imagery of the natural world and create aesthetic constructions.

abilities.name: Artistic Fundamentals
Artistic Analysis
abilities.effect: While you have a _Sketchbook_ you may, as a _Camp Action_, clear 1 _Stress_ then make an incredibly detailed sketch of something you saw today in your _Sketchbook_. The act of transferring this to your _Sketchbook_ gives you additional information about the target, typically the equivalent of the _Observation_ or _Advantage_ Augment, but may provide additional effects (such as additional Route Mastery when sketching a significant landmark) at GM discretion.

abilities.name: Artistic Expression
abilities.effect:
During Downtime you may create a grand piece of art of your chosen medium that is too large to easily transport but a wonderful gift to your current location. Choose whether this is an object of Fear, Wonder, or Glory:
* If you choose Fear, you depict a danger you encountered on your adventures.
* If you choose Wonder, you depict something incredible you saw on your journey.
* If you choose Glory, you depict you our your allies accomplishing great things on your journey.

While in the location that has your artwork you have treat it as an Advantage on checks relating to what it depicts or when leaning into its thematic meaning.

name: Herbalist
desc: You are well-studied when it comes to herbs, and can create many basic remedies from them even with limited supplies.

abilities.name: Herbalism
Gather Herbs
abilities.effect: When you <u>Forage</u> as a _Camp_ or _Travel_ _Action_ you may choose to roll on a specialized **Herbalist Chart** that offers more and rarer herbs. You may look at this area's **Herbalist Chart** before deciding to roll on it, although the GM may hide the specifics of the rarest option on the table.

abilities.name: Field Herbalism
abilities.effect: As a _Camp Action_, you may choose up to two herbs you have. You may Refine them and create an enhanced version, such as making a _Poultice_ from _Medicinal Herbs_. This action requires _Herbalism Tools_.

abilities.name: Cultivation
abilities.effect: Whenever you have downtime in a friendly location you may establish or cultivate a garden. Any Herbs you are carrying can be planted in the location. When you start a _Journey_ from a location with a garden you start with the refined version of herbs in the garden at no Cost, up to one per planted herb. You may instead choose to take the raw herbs themselves.

name: Hunter
desc: You are skilled at tracking game, and can easily supply food for your party while hunting.

abilities.name: Hunter
Skilled Hunter
Efficient Butcher
abilities.effect:
Whenever you <u>Hunt</u> and successfully find game, you may choose one:
* Increase the quality of the food found by one rank.
* Get an additional _Food_ (Passable, Meat).
* Increase the quality of any pelt or other material you might gather.
* Gain an additional, specialized benefit, as outlined by the GM.

You may take a _Stress_ to instead choose two different options.

abilities.name: Trapper
abilities.effect: During downtime, you may set a variety of traps in the wilderness. On the first day of your next _Journey_ you may collect these traps at no cost, gaining 1-3 _Food_ (Good, Meat) based on how much wildlife and small game is in the area.

name: Ranger
desc: You are an expert in the wilderness, allowing you to easily maneuver across the landscape while finding the time to resupply.

abilities.name: Wilderness Survival
Survival Instinct
abilities.effect: While traveling, you may spend one ▢ to offset the _Menace_ Danger. If you do, roll a d6; on a 3 or higher, take 1 _Stress_, otherwise take 1 _Fatigue_.

abilities.name: Multitasking
abilities.effect: While traveling, you may select any number of jobs when you play the _Efficacy_ Advantage.

abilities.name: Break Camp
abilities.effect: You may always, without spending a _Camp Action_, take the <u>Cover</u> or <u>Secure</u> _Camp Action_.

name: Blacksmith
desc: You are skilled at working with metal and, given a forge and time, can create a variety of tools and arms.

abilities.name: Strength of the Forge
Metallurgy
Metalworking
abilities.effect: When you _Mend_ while _Resting_ you automatically succeed if the item is _Metal_. Additionally, as a _Camp Action_, you may choose a _Destroyed_ piece of _Metal_ _Equipment_. Spend 1 piece of _Scrap_, then restore it to 1 _Durability_. This Action requires appropriate tools.

abilities.name: Forge-Trained
abilities.effect: Given appropriate tools and materials, you may craft Metal equipment. Most basic or rough tools can be crafted in a few hours, with more intricate or complicated tools taking longer.[Item crafting with extra benefits for metal]

name: Weaponsmith
desc: You specialize in crafting weapons of war, and few are your equal when crafting them.

abilities.name: Weapon Academia
Hone
abilities.effect: As a _Camp Action_, choose an ally (including yourself) without a _Weaponsmith's Blessing_. You may take the time to maintain that ally's weaponry, granting them a _Weaponsmith's Blessing_.

abilities.name: Weapon Maintenance
abilities.effect: When you take the _Mend_ _Camp Action_ you automatically succeed if the item is a weapon. Additionally, whenever you make camp, you may take the <u>Mend</u> or <u>Hone</u> _Camp Action_ without expending your _Camp Action_ for the day. When you do, roll a d6; on a 2-, you cannot use this ability until it is _Recovered_.

abilities.name: Forge Weapon
abilities.effect:
Given appropriate tools and materials, you may craft Weapons. All but the most crude of weapons take some time to craft. [Item crafting with extra benefits for weapons]

Additionally, at the start of a _Journey_, grant yourself and all allies a _Weaponsmith's Blessing_.

name: Tough
desc: You are exceptionally tough, pushing through any difficulty with determination and grit.

abilities.name: Exceptional Toughness
Toughened Hide
abilities.effect: When traveling in harsh conditions you may remove a single _Affliction_ or _Fatigue_ Hazard related to those conditions. You are naturally resilient and can power through rain, sleet, and heat.

abilities.name: Grin and Bear It
abilities.effect: When you would gain Hunger, Thirst, Fatigue, or a similar Affliction you may place it on this Ability instead of your Health Bar, ignoring its effect. You recover from this effect as normal, and may use this Power once there is no longer an Affliction on it.

abilities.name: Toughness
abilities.effect: Gain +1 _Grit_ and +2 Stamina. At _Respite_, gain half the _Stun_ you would gain from Afflictions.

abilities.name: True Grit
abilities.effect: The triggering effect cannot reduce you below 1 _Stamina_. Automatically succeed any roll to _Negate_ with _Grit_/_Focus_ on the triggering Attack.

name: Charming
desc: You have an easy smile and an innate charm, making others feel at ease in your presence.

abilities.name: Exceptional Charm
First Impression
abilities.effect: When meeting a new character you may charm them, causing them to treat you in a more friendly fashion. For example, a stranger might treat you as a friend, or a hostile creature may act more neutrally. If you attempt a _Skill Challenge_ against this character in the same _Scene_, you may roll _Skillfully_. You may use this Ability once per day for free; take a _Stress_ for each successive use.

abilities.name: Charming Presence
abilities.effect: At _Respite_ either target two allies with _Encourage_ [_Discount_ 1] or a single ally [_Discount_ 2].

abilities.name: Charm Offensive
abilities.effect: The Target gains 1 _Stun_, then must Negate [9 _Focus_]. On a failure, they have _Disadvantage_ to attack you until you make a hostile action against them, or they become afflicted with a similar effect. If they fail by 3 or more, inflict an additional 2 _Stun_.

name: Swift
desc: You are fleet of foot and incredibly nimble, allowing you to outrun your peers with ease.

abilities.name: Fleet of Foot
Quick March
abilities.effect: During a _Travel Roll_, you may spend one ▢ as _Speed_. You may take 1 _Fatigue_ to instead allow an ally to spend one ▢ as _Speed_ as you help them compensate for their pace.

abilities.name: Incredible Speed
abilities.effect: Gain +1 _Movement_ and _Reflex_. You have _Advantage_ the first time you _Negate_ with _Reflex_ each _Phase_.

abilities.name: Swiftest
abilities.trigger: The _Phase_ before the one you are supposed to take your _Turn_ in begins.
abilities.effect: Instead, take your turn in this _Phase_.

abilities.name: Agility
abilities.effect: Ignore any increased _Movement_ costs due to _Terrain_ for a single _Move_ this _Turn_.
